name: Ferry
description: A boat service across a waterway provides essential transportation for travelers and goods, while creating opportunities for toll collection and control. The ferry operator can provide information and services, while the crossing point can be vulnerable to attack or sabotage.
atmosphere: Sturdy boat provides regular service across the waterway while passengers and cargo wait at wooden docks. The ferryman poles or rows across as toll collection ensures profitable operation. Essential crossing point connects communities separated by water. Travelers gather to share news during the journey.
